definitions.text: a violent weather condition with winds 64-72 knots (11 on the Beaufort scale) and precipitation and thunder and lightning

examples: the storms that had characterized their relationship had died away
it was only a tempest in a teapot

definitions.text: a direct and violent assault on a stronghold
behave violently, as if in state of a great anger
rain, hail, or snow hard and be very windy, often with thunder or lightning
examples: If it storms, we'll need shelter
